org.apache.zab

Interface ServerState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Participant

    public interface ServerState
    An interface used to provide useful information for leader election. For now, we only use the size of the ensemble.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getEnsembleSize()
      Gets the size of the ensemble.
      int getProposedEpoch()
      Gets the last accepted proposed epoch.
      int getQuorumSize()
      Gets the minimal quorum size.
      List<String> getServerList()
      Gets a list of server ids.
